attributes.action: Ban petitions from cretins that cannot spell correctly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban petitions from your web site from cretins that do not spend sufficient time on correcting their punctuation, spelling and grammar.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
